## HiddenThreeJSMaterialProperties.onBeforeCompile property

Defines callback available in THREE.js materials.

Called before shader program compilation to generate vertex &amp; fragment shader output code.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onBeforeCompile?: CompileCallback;
```
